Detailed Description

template<typename Var1, typename Var2, bool Negated = false>
struct WatchLessConstraint< Var1, Var2, Negated >

constraints;watchless Description The constraint watchless(x,y) ensures that x is less than y. constraints;watchless References See also

help constraints ineq

Definition at line 75 of file dynamic_less.h.

template<typename Var1, typename Var2, bool Negated = false>
virtual bool WatchLessConstraint< Var1, Var2, Negated >::get_satisfying_assignment ( box< pair< int, DomainInt > > &  assignment  )  [inline, virtual]

Looks for a valid partial assignment to a constraint.

The return value (in the box) is pairs of <varnum, domain value>, where varnum is in the same position as returned by get_vars.

Reimplemented from AbstractConstraint.
